about_the_game:
Legends of Aria Classic revives the beloved MMORPG by returning to the pre-Steam Early Access ruleset of 2019, revered as the golden era by our passionate community. This classic version reintroduces the iconic Karma System and restores the original balance of protected and wilderness areas, setting the stage for new adventures in familiar lands.



Step into a vast, open world where your choices dictate your destiny. From being a valiant knight or a cunning mage to a skilled crafter or a fearless adventurer, every path offers unique challenges and opportunities. Engage in epic battles against mythical creatures and collaborate with allies in a dynamic sandbox environment that rewards skill and strategy.



Venture through dangerous wilderness where peril is at every turn, or navigate the bustling social hubs of sprawling cities. Build and personalize your homestead on the wild frontier to leave your mark within Aria. The game's profound crafting system, player-driven economy, and extensive customization options offer a truly immersive experience that harks back to the glory days of MMORPGs.



With the reintroduction of foundational systems like Karma and Factions, and plans to continuously expand these features, Legends of Aria Classic is poised for a thrilling renaissance. The relaunch will include a brand new server on Steam, enhancing the game with regular updates and new content driven by player feedback.



Legends of Aria Classic requires a monthly subscription after the first 30 days of launch, which are offered for free to all players. This subscription model ensures sustained development and support while enabling players to earn high-end cosmetics and rewards through gameplay, not payments.



Prepare to forge your legacy in the realms of Aria once more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 2 series or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible NVIDIA 960 / AMD 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Core i5 3 series or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible NVIDIA 960 / AMD 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
